room_title: Escape room "Revenge of the Misfit Toys" by Escape-A-Torium in Fayetteville (WV)
room_description: Revenge of the Misfit Toys! Welcome to the Toy Works and your first day on the job. Sadly, a recent tragedy took the lives of our previous toy makers. Rest assured we fixed that problem. Toy making can begin yet again as it has for over 100 years! Have a successful first day by correctly assembling 4 toys… oh… and lift the curse! Just joking!!! You will find everything you need in the break room and on the factory floor.
